00020 
00021 void UrlClient::initialize()
00022 {
00023 #ifdef WIN32
00024     CURLcode rc = curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_WIN32 | CURL_GLOBAL_ALL);
00025 #else
00026     CURLcode rc = curl_global_init(CURL_GLOBAL_ALL);
00027 #endif
00028 
00029     if (CURLE_OK != rc)
00030     {
00031         throw std::logic_error("Failed to initialize libcurl");
00032     }
00033 }
00034 
00035 void UrlClient::cleanup()
00036 {
00037     curl_global_cleanup();
00038 }
00039 
00040 void UrlClient::get(const string& url, string& response)
00041 {
00042     CURL* curlHandle = curl_easy_init();
00043     assert(curlHandle);
00044 
00045     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str());
00046     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, receiveData);
00047     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, &response);
00048     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, 1);
00049     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 5);
00050     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL, 1);
00051 
00052     CURLcode rc = curl_easy_perform(curlHandle);
00053     curl_easy_cleanup(curlHandle);
00054 
00055     if (CURLE_OK != rc)
00056     {
00057         throw std::logic_error("Failed to get " + url + ": " + curl_easy_strerror(rc));
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 void UrlClient::getBinary(const string& url, void* callback, void* parameter)
00062 {
00063     CURL* curlHandle = curl_easy_init();
00064     assert(curlHandle);
00065 
00066     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str());
00067     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, callback);
00068     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, parameter);
00069     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, 1);
00070     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 5);
00071     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL, 1);
00072 
00073     CURLcode rc = curl_easy_perform(curlHandle);
00074     curl_easy_cleanup(curlHandle);
00075 
00076     if (CURLE_OK != rc)
00077     {
00078         throw std::logic_error("Failed to get " + url + ": " + curl_easy_strerror(rc));
00079     }
00080 }

00082 void UrlClient::post(const string& url, const string& data, string& response)
00083 {
00084     CURL* curlHandle = curl_easy_init();
00085     assert(curlHandle);
00086 
00087     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, data.c_str());
00088     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_URL, url.c_str());
00089     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_WRITEFUNCTION, receiveData);
00090     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_WRITEDATA, &response);
00091     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_FAILONERROR, 1);
00092     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_CONNECTTIMEOUT, 5);
00093     curl_easy_setopt(curlHandle, CURLOPT_NOSIGNAL, 1);
00094 
00095     CURLcode rc = curl_easy_perform(curlHandle);
00096     curl_easy_cleanup(curlHandle);
00097 
00098     if(CURLE_OK != rc)
00099     {
00100         throw std::logic_error("Failed to post " + url + ": " + curl_easy_strerror(rc));
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00104 size_t receiveData(char* data, size_t size, size_t nmemb, string* pBuffer)
00105 {
00106     assert(pBuffer);
00107     size_t dataSize = size * nmemb;
00108     pBuffer->append(data, dataSize);
00109 
00110     return dataSize;
00111 }
